title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Jun 28 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Jun 28 2021
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1: Clay's trip to Buffalo Wild Wings tells you everything wrong with the Biden economy. Businesses can't find anyone to hire because Biden is paying people not to work. Bernie Sanders spouts socialist BS. Would you have Bernie Sanders run your popsicle stand? Democrat socialist policies will slow the economic recovery just like it did under Obama. A Caller explains why it doesn't pay to work. Kamala blames Trump for the border crisis.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
